metadata.region: Nordic AI Companies (Sweden, Finland, Norway, Denmark, Iceland) + Global AI Giants
metadata.source: Dagens Industri, TechCrunch, PitchBook, Sifted, Crunchbase, Omdena, Clutch

ai_companies.name: Lovable
ai_companies.description: Låter personer utan koderfarenhet programmera genom 'vibe coding' - beskriv vad du vill ha så skapar AI:n koden. Revolutionary no-code AI platform enabling anyone to build software through natural language.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Viral growth reaching SEK 720M ARR in under 2 years. Approaching unicorn status. Featured as fastest-growing Nordic AI startup.

milestones.event: Company founded by Depict AI alumni

ai_companies.name: Legora
ai_companies.description: AI-plattform för juridisk research och assistans. Kombinerar advokaters expertis med AI för att effektivisera juridiskt arbete. Leading legal AI platform transforming law firms with intelligent research and automation.
ai_companies.customers: 500+ law firms across Nordics and US
ai_companies.markets: Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, expanding US
ai_companies.partnerships: Anthropic, OpenAI, major Nordic law firms
ai_companies.recent_activity: Massive SEK 800M Series B from Iconiq (Facebook/Airbnb early investor). Expanding to US market with top-tier Silicon Valley backing.

milestones.event: Series A - SEK 350M at SEK 2.5B valuation
Series B - SEK 800M at SEK 6.5B valuation

ai_companies.name: Sana
ai_companies.description: AI-agent som baserar information på företagens egen data och användarnas arbetsuppgifter. Enterprise AI platform leveraging company data with transformer technology. Behind Swedish AI Reform initiative.

team.name: Joel Hellermark
team.background: Forbes 30 Under 30, Swedish AI Reform leader

team.name: Oscar Täckström
team.background: Transformer model pioneer, Google Research alumni

ai_companies.partnerships: Swedish government (AI Reform), major universities, OpenAI
ai_companies.initiatives: Swedish AI Reform (education), Annual Sana AI Summit
ai_companies.recent_activity: SEK 580M Series B led by Menlo Ventures. Leading Swedish AI Reform initiative. Hosting annual AI summit with global leaders including OpenAI, Anthropic.

milestones.event: Series A SEK 250M at SEK 1.8B valuation
Series B SEK 580M at SEK 5.3B valuation

ai_companies.name: Tandem Health
ai_companies.description: AI-assistent för journalföring från möten mellan läkare och patienter. Automatiserar medicinskt dokumentarbete. Leading medical AI scribe transforming clinical documentation.
ai_companies.recent_activity: SEK 500M Series A from Kinnevik & Northzone. Rapid expansion across Nordic healthcare. 400% YoY growth with 2K+ doctors using daily.

milestones.event: Series A SEK 500M at SEK 2.8B valuation

ai_companies.name: Listen Labs
ai_companies.description: AI-drivna röstintervjuer för kundundersökningar. AI genomför intervjuer och summerar insights automatiskt.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Backed by Sequoia (Klarna's lead investor), scaling in US market

ai_companies.name: Filed
ai_companies.description: AI för amerikanska skattekonsulter som förenklar komplicerade deklarationer i USA.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Launched 2024, rapid growth in US tax accountant market

ai_companies.name: Lightbringer
ai_companies.description: Skyddar immateriella rättigheter och automatiserar patentansökningar med AI och egenutvecklad mjukvara.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Early traction in patent automation

ai_companies.name: Talentium
ai_companies.description: AI för rekrytering som söker kandidater online och summerar deras erfarenheter och kompetenser automatiskt.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Backed by EQT Ventures, growing in Nordic recruitment market

ai_companies.name: AI-Bob
ai_companies.description: Effektiviserar byggbranschen genom att AI granskar ritningar utifrån svenska byggregler automatiskt.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Finalist at Di Digital Female Founders 2025

ai_companies.name: Aris Machina
ai_companies.description: AI-verktyg för optimering av tillverkningsprocesser. Grundat av Northvolt-grundaren Peter Carlsson.
investors: Village Global (Bill Gates, Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg)
ai_companies.recent_activity: Attracted massive backing from tech billionaires through Village Global

ai_companies.name: Andon Labs
ai_companies.description: Säkrar stora AI-modeller. Arbetar med Anthropic (Claude) och enligt uppgift även OpenAI (ChatGPT).
ai_companies.recent_activity: Working with Anthropic and reportedly OpenAI on AI safety

ai_companies.name: Arkion (formerly Skyqraft)
ai_companies.description: Hjälper elbolag att optimera och anpassa sina elnät med AI-driven analys och computer vision.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Rebranded from Skyqraft, expanding in European energy markets

ai_companies.name: Bluebook
ai_companies.description: 'ChatGPT för revisorer' - AI som behärskar skattesystem i hela världen för revisorer och skatteexperter.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Early traction among tax professionals

ai_companies.name: Buddywise
ai_companies.description: Förhindrar arbetsplatsolyckor med computer vision som känner igen hot genom kameror och sensorer.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Piloting with industrial customers

ai_companies.name: Dema AI
ai_companies.description: AI-verktyg för e-handel. Grundat av Babyshop-grundaren Marcus Tagesson.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building AI tools for e-commerce optimization

ai_companies.name: Freda
ai_companies.description: Tink-grundarnas (Daniel Kjellén & Fredrik Hedberg) hemliga AI-projekt. Rekryterar aktivt, nyligen värvad profil från Atomico.
ai_companies.founders: Daniel Kjellén, Fredrik Hedberg (Tink founders - €1.8B exit to Visa)
ai_companies.recent_activity: Active hiring, recruited from Atomico, highly secretive

ai_companies.name: Gilion (formerly Ark Capital)
ai_companies.description: Använder AI för att i realtid följa företags affärer och ge ut lån baserat på AI-driven kreditbedömning.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Raised SEK 500M in debt financing for lending operations

ai_companies.name: Intuicell
ai_companies.description: Robothundar och AI baserat på 35 års hjärnforskning. Utvecklar avancerad robotik med AI-styrning.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Backed by Wallenberg sphere, developing robot dogs for industrial use

ai_companies.name: Ipercept
ai_companies.description: AI-assistent för maskinoperatörer och underhållsteam inom industri. Kunder: Airbus, Porsche, Saab, Scania, Toyota.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Scaling with major automotive and aerospace customers

ai_companies.name: Kognic
ai_companies.description: Hjälper företag skapa högkvalitativa datasets för maskininlärning, främst fordonsindustrin (kamera/radar). Leading provider of high-quality training data for autonomous vehicles and computer vision AI.
ai_companies.products: Kognic Platform (data labeling), Quality Assurance AI
ai_companies.customers: Volvo Cars, Zenseact, Einride, Pony.ai, automotive Tier-1 suppliers
ai_companies.recent_activity: Strategic Nvidia investment positioning as critical autonomous driving data infrastructure. Powering Volvo's next-gen autonomous systems.

milestones.event: Series A SEK 120M with Nvidia participation
Series B SEK 250M led by Nvidia

ai_companies.name: Leap
ai_companies.description: Spotify-veteraner bygger AI-kodassistent för komplexa backend-behov, enterprise-lösningar och appar.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building 'Lovable for enterprise backend'

ai_companies.name: Modal
ai_companies.description: Låter AI-utvecklare koda direkt i molnet. AI-fokuserad cloud development platform.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Becoming infrastructure standard for AI developers

ai_companies.name: Normain
ai_companies.description: Automatiserar manuella uppgifter för små och medelstora företag med AI-agenter.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Strong angel investor backing from AI ecosystem

ai_companies.name: Phyron
ai_companies.description: Skapar tusentals reklamfilmer för bilförsäljare på under en minut med AI från fotos och information.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Scaling video AI for automotive marketing

ai_companies.name: Quartr
ai_companies.description: Samlar och analyserar information om börsbolag världen över med AI - rapporter, pressmeddelanden, earnings calls.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building financial intelligence platform with AI

ai_companies.name: Rerun
ai_companies.description: Kombinerar AI och fysisk värld för drönare, robotar och spatial computing. Kunder: Google, Meta.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Major funding round, working with tech giants on spatial computing

ai_companies.name: Ronja
ai_companies.description: AI-drivet operativsystem för tillverkningsindustrin. Grundat av Northvolt-avhoppare.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Just launched, leveraging Northvolt manufacturing expertise

ai_companies.name: Scape
ai_companies.description: AI-drivet CRM-system (Customer Relationship Management). Deltog i Y Combinator, finansiering från Wallenberg och Legora-grundare.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Graduated Y Combinator W25, strong Swedish investor backing

ai_companies.name: Scaleout Systems
ai_companies.description: Låter företag använda maskininlärning där data produceras (edge AI). Med i NATO-program för civil→militär teknologi.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Part of NATO civil-military technology program

ai_companies.name: Sics AI
ai_companies.description: AI-hjärna som styr robotar och eliminerar behov av omprogrammering vid miljö- eller uppgiftsbyten.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Developing universal robot control AI

ai_companies.name: Starhive
ai_companies.description: Automatiserar IT-hantering för stora företag - spåra datorer, hantera manualer och instruktioner med AI.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Growing in enterprise IT automation market

ai_companies.name: Stilla
ai_companies.description: AI-agent som automatiserar kommunikation mellan anställda. Grundat av Tictail/Shopify-veteraner.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Just launched, automating workplace communication

ai_companies.name: Strawberry
ai_companies.description: AI-assistenter i webbläsare som snabbt tagit fart globalt. Browser automation och AI assistance.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Viral global growth, millions of users

ai_companies.name: Tzafon
ai_companies.description: Bygger egna AI-agenter och språkmodell. Utvecklingskontor i Stockholm, Tel Aviv, San Francisco.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Sam Altman personal investment, building proprietary LLM

ai_companies.name: Terra Labs
ai_companies.description: Revolutionerar skogsindustrin med AI och satelliter. Optimerar skogsbruk med satellitdata och AI-analys.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Backed by Swedish tech billionaires, targeting forest industry

ai_companies.name: Turbotic
ai_companies.description: Kapar kostnader för AI- och automationslösningar. Gör AI mer ekonomiskt för företag.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Backed by Öresund investment company

ai_companies.name: Validio
ai_companies.description: Säkrar datakvalitet för AI-användning. Nått positivt kassaflöde med stora USA-kunder.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Reached profitability, scaling in US market

ai_companies.name: Vantel
ai_companies.description: Automatiserar arbetsuppgifter för försäkringsbranschen. Y Combinator alumni.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Y Combinator graduate, automating insurance workflows

ai_companies.name: Vesence
ai_companies.description: 'Cursor for lawyers' - AI-agenter för jurister och professionella. Y Combinator alumni.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Fresh out of Y Combinator, building legal AI tools

ai_companies.name: Vetnio
ai_companies.description: Automatiserar journalskrivning för veterinärer med AI-assisterad dokumentation.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Growing in Nordic veterinary market

ai_companies.name: Vionlabs
ai_companies.description: AI för att analysera och rekommendera video. Kunder: Paramount, Apple. Tommy Jacobssons fokus efter Marshall-affären.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Scaling with major media companies

ai_companies.name: Corti
ai_companies.description: AI that helps emergency dispatchers save lives by detecting critical conditions during calls.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Expanding globally, used in 911 dispatch centers

ai_companies.name: Minutes.ai
ai_companies.description: AI meeting assistant that automatically generates summaries and action items from meetings.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Growing user base in Nordics

ai_companies.name: Depict
ai_companies.description: AI-powered product discovery and search for e-commerce, improving conversion rates.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Rapid growth in Nordic e-commerce

ai_companies.name: Hour One
ai_companies.description: AI video generation platform creating synthetic videos with AI avatars (Israeli-Swedish connection).
ai_companies.recent_activity: Expanding in Nordic enterprise market

ai_companies.name: Einride
ai_companies.description: Autonomous electric freight vehicles and intelligent freight mobility. World's first commercial autonomous electric heavy transport vehicle. Transforming freight with AI-powered logistics.
ai_companies.products: Einride Pod (autonomous truck), Einride Saga (freight platform)
ai_companies.customers: Oatly, Coca-Cola, Lidl, GE Appliances, Electrolux, Maersk
ai_companies.partnerships: DB Schenker, Maersk, GE Appliances, Bridgestone
ai_companies.awards: TIME Best Inventions, Fast Company Most Innovative
ai_companies.recent_activity: $500M Series C achieving unicorn status. Major US expansion with GE Appliances partnership. Operating 300+ autonomous routes globally. 90% CO2 reduction impact.

milestones.event: World's first autonomous heavy transport on public road

ai_companies.name: Recordly
ai_companies.description: AI-powered legal document automation for Nordic law firms.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Early traction with law firms

ai_companies.name: Silo AI
ai_companies.description: Europe's largest private AI lab building custom AI solutions for enterprises. Acquired by AMD for $665 million.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Acquired by AMD for $665M in July 2024, Europe's largest AI acquisition

ai_companies.name: Relesys
ai_companies.description: AI-powered employee communication and engagement platform for frontline workers across retail and service industries.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Expanding across Europe with major retail chains

ai_companies.name: Strise
ai_companies.description: AI-powered KYC and compliance platform automating customer onboarding and monitoring for financial institutions.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Strong growth in Nordic financial sector compliance

ai_companies.name: Neural DSP
ai_companies.description: AI-powered guitar amp and effects modeling creating ultra-realistic digital audio processing for musicians worldwide.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Highly profitable, 500K+ users globally

ai_companies.name: Alva Labs
ai_companies.description: AI-based psychometric testing and candidate assessment platform helping companies make better hiring decisions.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Expanding to UK and DACH markets

ai_companies.name: Aiven
ai_companies.description: Open-source data infrastructure platform with AI-powered database management serving global enterprises.
ai_companies.recent_activity: $210M Series D at $3B valuation

ai_companies.name: Supermetrics
ai_companies.description: AI-powered marketing data integration platform used by 200K+ marketers to automate reporting and analytics.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Profitable, $100M+ ARR with 200K customers

ai_companies.name: Dreamdata
ai_companies.description: AI-powered B2B revenue attribution platform helping companies understand their entire customer journey.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Fast growth in B2B SaaS attribution

ai_companies.name: Hoxhunt
ai_companies.description: AI-powered cybersecurity training platform using behavioral science to protect organizations from phishing attacks.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Protecting 1M+ users across 150+ countries

ai_companies.name: Unsilo
ai_companies.description: AI for academic publishing and research discovery, helping researchers find relevant scientific content. Acquired by Wiley.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Acquired by Wiley, powering academic research discovery

ai_companies.name: Omnipresent
ai_companies.description: AI-powered global employment platform helping companies hire and manage international teams compliantly.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Rapid global expansion, $120M Series B

ai_companies.name: Leena AI
ai_companies.description: AI-powered virtual assistant for employee experience, automating HR support and workplace queries with conversational AI.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Serving 1M+ employees globally

ai_companies.name: Pulsify
ai_companies.description: AI-powered cardiovascular diagnostics platform using advanced algorithms for early heart disease detection.
ai_companies.recent_activity: CE-marked medical device, clinical validation ongoing

ai_companies.name: Dispelix
ai_companies.description: AI-enhanced augmented reality display technology for smart glasses and AR wearables using waveguide optics.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Partnering with major smart glasses manufacturers

ai_companies.name: Penni.io
ai_companies.description: AI-powered contract analysis and review platform automating legal document processing for law firms and corporates.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Expanding across Nordic legal market

ai_companies.name: Vertical
ai_companies.description: AI-powered vertical farming technology optimizing crop yields using machine learning and automation for sustainable food production.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Scaling vertical farming across Nordics

ai_companies.name: Speechly
ai_companies.description: AI-powered voice interface API enabling developers to add real-time voice commands to applications with high accuracy.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Voice API for 1000+ applications

ai_companies.name: Timeshifter
ai_companies.description: AI-powered jet lag and shift work app using circadian neuroscience to optimize sleep and performance for travelers.
ai_companies.recent_activity: 1M+ downloads, partnerships with airlines

ai_companies.name: Modulai
ai_companies.description: AI-powered predictive maintenance for industrial equipment using sensor data and machine learning to prevent failures.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Serving oil & gas and manufacturing sectors

ai_companies.name: Alice
ai_companies.description: AI-powered personalised learning platform where students upload study materials and receive adaptive notes, quizzes, flashcards and simulated tests. Y Combinator alumni.
ai_companies.recent_activity: YC W24, freemium model with university partnerships

ai_companies.name: Dream Stories
ai_companies.description: AI-powered personalised storybooks for children featuring individuals as characters. Subscription service creating unique reading experiences.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Personalized children's content using generative AI

ai_companies.name: Polar
ai_companies.description: Payment infrastructure for AI-native SaaS companies, described as 'Stripe 2.0' for the new era of software developers. Founded by Tictail/Shopify alumni.
ai_companies.recent_activity: $10M seed led by Accel for AI-native payments

ai_companies.name: All Gravy
ai_companies.description: AI-first employee engagement platform for restaurants and retail improving work experience for frontline staff and customer experience.
ai_companies.recent_activity: $2.9M round co-led by Scale Capital and Moonfire 2025

ai_companies.name: Ethira
ai_companies.description: Next-gen risk and resilience platform powered by agentic AI. Transforms how organisations manage operational risk, shifting from reactive compliance to proactive visibility and intelligent action.
ai_companies.founders: Jasper Mills, Lucas de Araújo, Fredrik Ygge
ai_companies.recent_activity: Just launched, targeting cyber resilience compliance

ai_companies.name: ZeroGPT
ai_companies.description: Advanced AI content detector tool for identifying ChatGPT, GPT-4, GPT-5, Gemini, Grok, DeepSeek and other AI-generated content. Trusted by millions of users for detecting AI-written text.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Leading AI detection tool with multiple language support and API access

ai_companies.name: Thinkvas AI
ai_companies.description: Multi-threaded AI knowledge canvas enabling parallel AI conversations with branching and context inheritance. Visual thinking tool that breaks free from linear AI chats.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Public beta for research and education purposes

ai_companies.name: JourneyDXP
ai_companies.description: Digital experience platform for creating interactive customer journeys and experiences using AI-powered tools.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building AI-powered digital experience solutions

ai_companies.name: Agaton AI
ai_companies.description: Voice-enabled, domain-specific AI agents for sales and customer service teams. AI 'coworkers' join tech stack, listen to calls, analyse and respond with feedback.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Seed round from Foundry Ventures 2025

ai_companies.name: Zero
ai_companies.description: AI-powered 'zero-click' CRM unifying scattered data and eliminating manual workflows. Replacing traditional go-to-market tools with intuitive platform. Founded by Smartly cofounder.
ai_companies.recent_activity: $2.7M pre-seed led by 20VC in Dec 2024

ai_companies.name: Midio
ai_companies.description: Visual-first, agentic platform for building, debugging and deploying AI-powered workflows and apps with drag-and-drop interface for developers and non-developers.
ai_companies.recent_activity: $660k from Sondo Capital 2023

ai_companies.name: Nolla Health
ai_companies.description: AI-powered dermatology tools using vision transformation and large multimodal AI models trained on 1M+ labelled cases for early skin condition detection.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Just launched with 1M+ training cases

ai_companies.name: Handshake
ai_companies.description: AI agent that shops and pays for customers based on their preferences. Starting with online shopping and everyday purchases like food delivery.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Launching October 2025

ai_companies.name: Opper
ai_companies.description: Integrating AI into applications. Founded by Unomaly founders who exited their ML startup 5 years ago. Building next-gen AI integration platform.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Second AI company for successful ML founders

ai_companies.name: Databutton
ai_companies.description: AI-powered app development platform enabling rapid application building with AI assistance. Backed by Skyfall Ventures.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building AI-native app development tools

ai_companies.name: Nordsense
ai_companies.description: SaaS-based smart waste management platform optimizing waste collection timing and volume management using AI and IoT sensors.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Smart waste collection across Nordic cities

ai_companies.name: Skira
ai_companies.description: Connecting farmers and mills with consumer brands through AI platform enabling food chain traceability and environmental/social sustainability.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building sustainable food supply chain transparency

ai_companies.name: SweGreen
ai_companies.description: Agtech company and vertical farming venture using AI to optimize indoor farming and sustainable food production.
ai_companies.founders: Sepehr Mousavi, Marcus Petersson, Pierre Mohlin, Joakim Rytterborn, Andreas Dahlin
ai_companies.recent_activity: Scaling vertical farming across Nordics

ai_companies.name: Ento Labs
ai_companies.description: Expert energy AI analyzing and monitoring energy consumption for most effective improvements, reducing operational costs and carbon emissions.
ai_companies.recent_activity: AI-driven energy optimization for enterprises

ai_companies.name: Sensae
ai_companies.description: Mental wellness company helping people manage stress and anxiety using AI to interface with emotions through personalized haptic biofeedback.
ai_companies.founders: Olivier Simone, Daniel Lyngholm, Liviu Babitz
ai_companies.recent_activity: AI-powered biofeedback for mental wellness

ai_companies.name: Applied Autonomy
ai_companies.description: Delivers knowledge, solutions and services for sustainable autonomous transportation with control center systems for autonomous traffic implementation.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Piloting autonomous vehicles in Norwegian cities

ai_companies.name: GIM Robotics
ai_companies.description: Proprietary GIM SW Stack turns mobile working machines into full-blooded field and service robots, speeding up product development for Fortune 500 companies.
ai_companies.founders: Prof Aarne Halme, Dr Jari Saarinen, Dr Jussi Suomela, Dr Jose Luis Peralta
ai_companies.recent_activity: Trombia Free autonomous street cleaning robot

ai_companies.name: Svarmi
ai_companies.description: Creates transparency on nature interaction using AI with data from satellites, drones and sensors. Helps mitigate risks and manage stakeholder dialogue for renewable energy and construction.
ai_companies.customers: 110+ clients across renewable energy, carbon finance, construction
ai_companies.recent_activity: Award-winning geospatial AI for climate projects

ai_companies.name: Augment City
ai_companies.description: Humanizing and contextualizing complex urban data. AI-powered smart and sustainable solutions throughout urban development involving inhabitants and decision-makers.
ai_companies.recent_activity: AI-driven urban development and planning

ai_companies.name: Inify Laboratories
ai_companies.description: AI-supported cancer diagnostics through ultra-modern pathology laboratory services. Fully digital, standardized workflow optimizing quality and response times.
ai_companies.recent_activity: AI pathology for prostate cancer diagnostics

ai_companies.name: Bulbitech
ai_companies.description: Advanced neurological eye examination equipment and AI software for neuro-ophthalmologists and optometrists.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Neurological eye examination AI research

ai_companies.name: ThinkOutside
ai_companies.description: AI platform providing accurate and reliable snow data for planning purposes using satellite and sensor data analysis.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Snow data analytics for infrastructure planning

ai_companies.name: Addi Medical
ai_companies.description: HOPE - Healthcare Operability with Patient Engagement. Disruptive AI-powered point of connection for digital patient engagement and education.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Digital parent education and patient engagement

ai_companies.name: Stock Republic
ai_companies.description: Machine learning platform providing investment benchmarks and guidance with real data. Full mobile-first B2B platform with APIs for banks.
ai_companies.recent_activity: White-label AI investment platform for banks

ai_companies.name: Precure
ai_companies.description: AI solution preventing muscular strain to create healthier workplaces, reduce costs and loss of productivity through ergonomic analysis.
ai_companies.recent_activity: AI-powered workplace ergonomics and safety

ai_companies.name: Spacept
ai_companies.description: Fuses artificial intelligence with satellite imagery to protect infrastructure and tackle climate change through vegetation monitoring.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Vegetation monitoring for climate protection

ai_companies.name: SustainLab
ai_companies.description: SaaS Sustainability Management Software automating collection, processing and visualization of ESG sustainability data.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Automating ESG reporting for enterprises

ai_companies.name: ManoMotion
ai_companies.description: AI-enhanced hand tracking technology for augmented reality applications enabling gesture-based interactions in AR/VR environments.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Hand tracking AI for AR/VR applications

ai_companies.name: Random Forest
ai_companies.description: BI and big data consulting with generative AI capabilities. Enterprise AI analytics and data science solutions since 2012.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Enterprise AI and data consulting

ai_companies.name: Dyno Robotics
ai_companies.description: AI development for robotics and custom software solutions enabling intelligent autonomous systems.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Building intelligent robotics solutions

ai_companies.name: AI ARMY
ai_companies.description: AI development and Robotic Process Automation company building intelligent automation solutions for enterprises.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Just launched, focusing on enterprise RPA

ai_companies.name: Artificial Solutions
ai_companies.description: Conversational AI and virtual assistant platform for enterprises. Pioneer in AI since 2001 building intelligent chatbots and voice assistants.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Long-established conversational AI leader

ai_companies.name: Univrses
ai_companies.description: Computer vision and AI for autonomous systems. 3DAI™ City platform provides real-time spatial data analytics for urban planners and sustainable smart city development.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Powering autonomous vehicles and smart city initiatives

ai_companies.name: Volumental
ai_companies.description: 3D foot scanning and AI-powered shoe fit recommendations using computer vision and machine learning. Trusted by global footwear brands to enhance shopping experience.
ai_companies.customers: 1000+ footwear retailers globally including New Balance, Bauer Hockey
ai_companies.recent_activity: 200M+ feet scanned worldwide, reducing returns by 20%

ai_companies.name: Stream Analyze
ai_companies.description: Real-time AI analytics on edge devices enabling immediate decision-making and predictive maintenance without cloud dependency. sa.engine™ platform for manufacturing and energy.
ai_companies.recent_activity: Edge AI deployment for real-time industrial analytics

ai_companies.name: ZenRobotics
ai_companies.description: AI-powered robotic waste sorting systems using ZenBrain AI to efficiently identify and sort waste materials. Making waste processing safer and more efficient.
